name: X hundred
description:
There are a hundred particles, each comes with some tricks.
Collect the numbers, avoid any collisions and try to survive as long as you can.
You start with two but will receive more lives as you keep playing.

Beat your own high scores and rock the leaderboard too!

Game Features:
- Free to play.
- Watch ad to revive and continue for once.
- Watch ad to start with three lives.
- Purchase to always start with three lives and uninterrupted revive.
publishers: Kar-Tek Yapi Endustri Sanayi Ve Ticaret Limited Sirketi
